summary: FUEL CROSSFLOW: UNUSED FUEL FROM REAR TANK RETURNS TO FRONT TANK, CAUSING FUEL OVERFLOW AND FUEL SPILLAGE.  VEHICLE WAS RECALLED FOR THIS CONDITION IN 1994.  RECALL  #93S68 WAS PERFORMED BY SELLING DEALER IN 1994.  PROBLEM WITH FUEL CROSSFLOW BEGAN IN DECEMBER, 2016.  FORD HAD ISSUED AN EXTENDED RECALL #01M05 FOR THIS CONDITION FOR 12 YEARS OR 150,000 MILES, WHICHEVER COMES FIRST.  VEHICLE HAS ONLY 75,600 MILES, BUT IS NOW 24 YEARS OLD, SO IS NOT STILL COVERED.  HOWEVER, I FEEL THIS IS A DANGEROUS CONDITION, RISKING A FIRE WHILE VEHICLE IS RUNNING.
